basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Aerococcus viridans (MIC=0.4-0.8 µM), Micrococcus luteus (MIC=0.8-1.6 µM), Bacillus megaterium (MIC=3.12-6.25 µM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli 363 (MI=3.12-6.25 µM), Vibrio vulnificus (MIC>50 µM), Salmonella thyphimurium (MIC>50 µM), Klebsiella pneumoniae (MIC>50 µM).Fungi:Fusarium oxysporum (MIC=3.12-6.25 µM).
